# Deployment

## Sub-Phases

### Plan Deployment
- Define the deployment strategy (e.g., cloud-based, on-premises).
- Prepare infrastructure and resources for deployment.

### Deploy Solution
- Implement the macroeconomic forecasting app in the production environment.
- Ensure all components are functioning as expected.

### Monitor and Maintain
- Set up monitoring for app performance and forecast accuracy.
- Develop a maintenance plan to address issues and updates.

### Review Deployment
- Gather feedback from stakeholders and users.
- Evaluate the app's impact on decision-making and business goals.

## Objectives
- Deploy the macroeconomic forecasting app to production.
- Set up monitoring and maintenance processes.

## Deliverables
- Deployment plan for the app.
- Documentation for monitoring and maintaining the app.
